attributes.action: Make Simon Jordan of Talksport Radio Run for PM in the next General Election.
attributes.additional_details: We've listened to The BBC, ITV, C4, Channel 5 and Sky news and all have their own agenda now us footy fans who listen to TalkSPORT have decided the only person who talks any sense in any matter Is SImon Jordan! He’d do a far better job than the current Shower so lets give him a crack at the whip! Come on Simon Do it for great Britain!
attributes.background: The country is in turnoil because politicians of every party stab each other in the back for their own version of game of thrones! They have forgotten about the people they represent! So its time to shake it up to the core. And Get Simon Jordan to Run in the next genera election.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or to lose a job, including Prime Minister. In any case, the decision as to whether to run for elected office is for an individual to make, not the UK Government or Parliament.
